akn:section.akn:heading: Trafficking in counterfeit labels, illicit labels, or counterfeit documentation or packaging

akn:content.akn:p: (c) The circumstances referred to in subsection (a) of this section are—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Forfeiture and Destruction of Property; Restitution.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Forfeiture, destruction, and restitution relating to this section shall be subject to section 2323, to the extent provided in that section, in addition to any other similar remedies provided by law.
